name: Epic.Mastermind_Soul_Mastery
display_help: Ghost Widow has granted you access to the power of darkness and souls. She has shown you how to use the souls of your victims to destroy your enemies. This has granted you access to powers and abilities you have never had before.

powers.name: Epic.Mastermind_Soul_Mastery.Night_Fall
powers.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 20° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 10 ticks of 3.36 negative energy damage over 2.8s on target
10 ticks of 6.88 negative energy damage over 2.8s on target
10 ticks of 4.33 negative energy damage over 2.8s on target
10 ticks of 7.21 negative energy damage over 2.8s on target

powers.name: Epic.Mastermind_Soul_Mastery.Dark_Embrace
powers.display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 27.50% resistance to smashing damage for 0.75s on self
19.25% resistance to smashing damage for 0.75s on self
27.50% resistance to lethal damage for 0.75s on self
19.25% resistance to lethal damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to negative energy damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
10.50% resistance to negative energy damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
27.50% resistance to smashing damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
19.25% resistance to smashing damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
27.50% resistance to lethal damage for 0.75s on self
19.25% resistance to lethal damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Epic.Mastermind_Soul_Mastery.Oppressive_Gloom
powers.display_help: The Netherworld has many mutable properties, such as the Oppressive Gloom. This power allows you to use your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. You must be level 41 and have Night Fall or Dark Embrace before selecting this power. Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Epic.Mastermind_Soul_Mastery.Soul_Tentacles
powers.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows the souls of the damned to slip into our reality. These Soul Tentacles will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while they drain their life. You must be level 41 and have Night Fall or Dark Embrace before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 25° arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Epic.Mastermind_Soul_Mastery.Soul_Storm
powers.display_help: Like Ghost Widow, you can summon the souls of your victims to do your bidding. Soul Storm enraptures a single target Holding them while their life-force is drained from their body. You must be level 44 and have two other Soul Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow
